name: StepFuncTool
modelDescription: Execute AWS Step Functions commands. ALWAYS provide params object. Examples: ListStateMachines {command:'ListStateMachines', params:{maxResults:10}}. StartExecution {command:'StartExecution', params:{stateMachineArn:'arn:aws:states:...', input:'{\"key\":\"value\"}'}}. DescribeExecution {command:'DescribeExecution', params:{executionArn:'arn:aws:states:...'}}. GetExecutionHistory {command:'GetExecutionHistory', params:{executionArn:'arn:aws:states:...', maxResults:100}}.
userDescription: Manage and run AWS Step Functions state machines

command.description: The Step Functions command to execute

params.description: REQUIRED parameters object. Always include this even if empty. Provide stateMachineArn/executionArn as needed.

stateMachineArn.description: State machine ARN (Used by: DescribeStateMachine (Required), ListExecutions, StartExecution (Required), UpdateStateMachine (Required))

maxResults.description: Maximum items to return where supported (Used by: ListExecutions, ListStateMachines, GetExecutionHistory)

nextToken.description: Pagination token (Used by: ListExecutions, ListStateMachines, GetExecutionHistory)

reverseOrder.description: Whether to return events in reverse chronological order (Used by: GetExecutionHistory)

statusFilter.description: Filter executions by status (Used by: ListExecutions)

input.description: JSON string input for execution (Used by: StartExecution)

definition.description: State machine definition in Amazon States Language (Used by: UpdateStateMachine)

roleArn.description: IAM role ARN for the state machine (Used by: UpdateStateMachine)

publish.description: Set true to publish a new version (Used by: UpdateStateMachine)

versionDescription.description: Description for the published version (Used by: UpdateStateMachine)
